steps.name: User should be on start page

comments.value: # Add media plan and enable advertising account for Adwords

steps.name: Enter Name "Testing the syncing of the campaigns"

arguments.val: Testing the syncing of the campaigns

steps.name: User should be on product page
Select Project by searching with keywords
User should be on creative page
Click Google Display accordion to create a creative group
Select Responsive Ad from the dropdown to add creative group
Enter Creative group name "Testing creative group for Google Adwords with Responsive Ad"

arguments.val: Testing creative group for Google Adwords with Responsive Ad

steps.name: Click Submit button- New creative group for Google
Click Facebook Default accordion to create a creative group
Click on plus button to create a new creative group
Enter Creative group name for Facebook "Testing creative group form for the Facebook"

arguments.val: Testing creative group form for the Facebook

steps.name: Click Submit button- New creative group
Click plus icon to create new marketing pitch for Adwords
Enter Communication name "Testing for adwords search"
Enter Description "Testing for the adwords search description"

arguments.val: Testing for the adwords search description

steps.name: Select Marketing Images from the dropdown
Click plus icon to create new marketing pitch for Facebook
Enter Communication name for facebook "Testing Facebook Marketing Pitch"
Enter Ad's description "Testing ad description for the facebook default campaign"

arguments.val: Testing ad description for the facebook default campaign

steps.name: Select Creative Groups from the dropdown
User should be on precise control page
Enter Location in Include for Facebook
Select the Min and Max Age
Select Bid On from the dropdown
Select Bidding Type and Bidding Amount

comments.value: #    And Enter Interest for the campaign

steps.name: User should be on Tracking page
Enter URL tagging specs for Facebook "utm_source="
Select Default lead type for Facebook
Click the Confirm button on an alert popup
User should be on Budget page
Select Google Search from the dropdown to add campaign details
Enter Name of the campaign "Testing the campaign details"
Click Save button- Google Search Campaign Form
Select Facebook from the dropdown to add campaign details
Enter Name for Facebook "Testing Facebook Campaign Details"
User should be on Goals page
Enter Cost per Click for Facebook "100"
Enter Cost per Lead for Facebook "100"
Click the Confirm button on an alert popup
User should be on Review page
Click Google Display accordion for Review
Click the Confirm button on an alert popup
Click Facebook Conversion accordion for Review
Click the Confirm button on an alert popup
Refresh the page to change the status

name: Media plan wizard
description: This feature describes about the media plan wizard for the campaigns from start to review page
